summary: TAKATA AIRBAGS RECALL.  THIS HAS BEEN A KNOWN PROBLEM FOR YEARS. THESE PEOPLE ARE STALLING HOPING THAT MANY OF THESE CARS WILL WIND UP IN THE JUNK YARD BEFORE THEY HAVE TO FIX THEM. WHILE THEY ARE SCREWING AROUND THEY SHOULD HAVE TO PAY TO DISABLE THESE AIRBAGS UNTIL THEY GET A FIX AVAILABLE. APPARENTLY IT IS OK WITH THE NTSB THAT I RISK MY LIFE TWICE (IN AN ACCIDENT AND HAVING MY HEAD BLOWN OFF BY THESE DEFECTIVE AIRBAGS. )
